desc: The At Home with Farmhouse On Main subscription box is a collection of 5-8 farmhouse style inspired home décor pieces curated for you and delivered to your door every other month. Our commitment to you is simple – to infuse your home with the charm, character and functionality that farmhouse style is known for.

layout.text: Your home is a story waiting to begin. Start writing it today...
with the At Home Subscription Box from Farmhouse On Main, a collection of farmhouse style inspired home décor curated for you and delivered to your door every other month.
